Text.Page:
Something happened to the {@LinkCreature:22#13#blood marms}! They're running around cursing students and animating the toys!

If we don't stop them, it could be the dollpocalypse!

The blood marms turned on the children?

You've stopped them, though? My, this is a lot of information all at once.

Does this mean there are animated dolls still running around? Or has the madness ended?
